amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Southwest Border Prosecution Initiative by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Southwest Border Prosecutor Initiative by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Reyes.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reyes amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
